title: Kindreds masks
body:
Like everyone else I really like kindred's appearance and lore!!! and also like everyone else i want those masks hahaha
so if anyone is a pro with 3D modelling software, they should make the masks and then everyone else can 3D print them. :P

replies.body: Yeah, someone should 3D print it and sell it. I wish Riot could make it and sell it on their merchandise website.
